name: The Flashpoint Paradox (Demo)
description:
My very first Uni project that I worked on for the module Game Engines and the Principles of Programming. Also the first time using Unity and its programming language, C#.

As unexperienced as I was with the Engine, I decided that my design shouldn't be too complex either. 

To design this short demo, I took inspiration (and some assets) from old school, 2D beat 'em ups.

The following content were used:

Background

https://www.spriters-resource.com/snes/spidermancarnage/sheet/71146/

The Flash sprite

https://www.spriters-resource.com/genesis_32x_scd/justiceleaguetf/sheet/20795/

Thug sprites

https://www.spriters-resource.com/snes/spawn/sheet/10966/

SFXs

https://downloads.khinsider.com/game-soundtracks/album/spider-man-and-venom-maxi...
